text: Viva La Bam is an American reality television series created by Bam Margera and Troy Miller for MTV. It starred Bam Margera, his father Phil, his mother April, his uncle Don Vito, and his friends Ryan Dunn, Raab Himself, Brandon DiCamillo, and Rake Yohn. It was a spin-off of the television series Jackass. The show ran from October 26, 2003 until August 14, 2005. There was a two-part special titled "Viva La Spring Break" that aired on March 22, 2006. In the show, Bam and his friends get up to many different antics such as pranking his family and friends and doing stunts. Much of the show took place in West Chester, Pennsylvania and at at Margera's mansion Castle Bam in Pocopson Township, Pennsylvania. The show also featured appearances many well-known celebrities and musicians such as Slayer and Cradle of Filth. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2000s American reality television series Category:2003 American television series debuts Category:2005 American television series endings Category:American television spin-offs Category:English-language television programs Category:MTV programmes
title: Viva La Bam
